lexUnit.name: scan.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: look at quickly in order to identify relevant features or information.

sentence.text: Before getting off the bed , Mungo scanned the books to see what reading matter Vic preferred .
